name: nice
trans: adv.友好的，亲切的，讨人喜欢的

sentences.english: They’ve got a very nice house.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.english: Did you have a nice time?
sentences.chinese: 你们玩得开心吗？

sentences.english: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.chinese: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.english: What a nice surprise!
sentences.chinese: 真是个惊喜！

sentences.english: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

detailed_translations.english: pleasant, attractive, or enjoyable

sentences.english: a clever man
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人

detailed_translations.english: able to learn and understand things quickly

sentences.english: He was a quiet shy man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个话不多、害羞的男人。

sentences.english: a shy smile
sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.english: As a teenager, I was painfully shy (= extremely shy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我十几岁时害羞得很。

detailed_translations.english: nervous and embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people, especially people you do not know
if a horse shies, it makes a sudden movement away from something because it is frightened

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: I have some bad news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有坏消息要告诉你。

sentences.english: I thought things couldn’t possibly get any worse.
sentences.chinese: 我想事情最坏也不过如此了。

sentences.english: The plane was delayed for several hours by bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气不好，飞机延误了好几个小时。

sentences.english: It’s difficult to break bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 坏习惯很难改。

sentences.english: a bad smell
sentences.chinese: 难闻的气味

detailed_translations.english: unpleasant or likely to cause problems

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的空气很凉爽。

sentences.english: Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September
sentences.chinese: 九月较凉爽的天气

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

name: aunt
trans: adv.姨母；姑母；舅母；伯母；婶母

sentences.english: Aunt Mary
sentences.chinese: 玛丽姑妈

detailed_translations.english: the sister of your father or mother, or the wife of your father’s or mother’s brother

name: uncle
trans: adv.伯父；叔父；舅父；姑父；姨父

sentences.english: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.english: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.english: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.chinese: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

detailed_translations.english: used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

sentences.english: a little house
sentences.chinese: 小屋

sentences.english: a cake decorated with little flowers
sentences.chinese: 点缀着小花的蛋糕

sentences.english: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.
sentences.chinese: 她把肉切成小丁。

sentences.english: Let me tell you a little bit about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我来给你稍微讲讲我自己吧。

sentences.english: We didn’t have toys like this when I was little.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们没有这样的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: small in size

sentences.english: a cute little puppy
sentences.chinese: 一只逗人爱的小狗

sentences.english: The baby’s so cute.
sentences.chinese: 这婴儿真可爱。

sentences.english: That’s a really cute outfit.
sentences.chinese: 那套衣服真漂亮。

detailed_translations.english: very pretty or attractive

sentences.english: The nearest big city was St. Louis.
sentences.chinese: 最近的大城市是圣路易斯。

detailed_translations.english: a large important town

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

sentences.english: She was even more beautiful than I had remembered.
sentences.chinese: 她比我记忆中更美。

sentences.english: a beautiful bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 一束美丽的花

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is beautiful is extremely attractive to look at

sentences.english: So who are your real friends and whose real friends are you?
sentences.chinese: 而谁是你的真正的朋友，你又是谁的真正的朋友呢？

sentences.english: That’s the man whose house has burned down. ＃
sentences.chinese: 就是那个男人的房子被烧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

sentences.english: Would you mind if I closed the window?
sentences.chinese: 我把窗户关上你不介意吧？

sentences.english: She closed the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 她拉上了窗帘。

sentences.english: Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
sentences.chinese: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.english: Beth closed her eyes and tried to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 贝丝合上眼睛想睡觉。

sentences.english: She heard the door close behind her.
sentences.chinese: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

sentences.english: I will now close the meeting by asking you to join me in a final toast.
sentences.chinese: 现在我要请大家最后干一杯来结束这次会议。

detailed_translations.english: to shut something in order to cover an opening, or to become shut in this way

sentences.english: an old man
sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.english: Are you older than Sally?
sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.english: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.english: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.chinese: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is old has lived for a very long time

sentences.english: a famous actor
sentences.chinese: 著名演员

sentences.english: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.english: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.english: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.chinese: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

detailed_translations.english: known about by many people in many places

sentences.english: cars built by robots
sentences.chinese: 机器人制造的汽车

detailed_translations.english: a machine that can move and do some of the work of a person, and is usually controlled by a computer

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.chinese: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.english: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.chinese: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.english: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.chinese: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

detailed_translations.english: each thing or all things

sentences.english: But if one day you call...
sentences.chinese: 但是如果有一天你打电话给我……

sentences.english: You'll answer for your wrongdoing one day.
sentences.chinese: 你总有一天会为做的坏事而受到惩罚。

sentences.english: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。

detailed_translations.english: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

sentences.english: They partook of our triumph.
sentences.chinese: 他们分享我们的胜利。

sentences.english: She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.english: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: I’ll see you Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 星期二见。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Monday and Wednesday

sentences.english: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.english: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Tuesday and Thursday

sentences.english: She was working Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 她星期四在工作。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Wednesday and Friday

sentences.english: Diane won’t be here Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五黛安娜不来这里。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Thursday and Saturday

sentences.english: Our guests have arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我们的客人到了。

sentences.english: Has anyone phoned?
sentences.chinese: 有人打过电话来吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.english: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 我已经15年没见他了。

sentences.english: ‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.chinese: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.english: You haven’t done much, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你没做多少，是吗？

sentences.english: They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.english: She sat down and had another drink.
sentences.chinese: 她坐下来又喝了一杯。

detailed_translations.chinese: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
detailed_translations.english: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say that someone owns something or that it is available for them to use

sentences.english: The next six months will be the hardest.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的六个月将是最难熬的。

sentences.english: The man in the next chair was asleep.
sentences.chinese: 邻座的男子睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: coming straight after sb/sth in time, order or space

sentences.english: I can’t see you this week.
sentences.chinese: 我这星期不能见你。

detailed_translations.english: a period of seven days and nights, usually measured in Britain from Monday to Sunday and in the US from Sunday to Saturday

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

sentences.english: Will you take the job?
sentences.chinese: 你接受这份工作吗？

sentences.english: Do you take American Express?
sentences.chinese: 你们接受美国运通信用卡吗？

sentences.english: If you take my advice , you’ll see a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你听我的意见，就去看医生。

sentences.english: Our helpline take s 3.5 million calls (= telephone calls ) a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的求助热线每年接听350万个电话。

sentences.english: Some doctors are unwilling to take new patients without a referral.
sentences.chinese: 有些医生不愿意接收没有转诊单的新病人。

sentences.english: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.chinese: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.english: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.chinese: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.english: Staff have agreed to take a 2% pay cut.
sentences.chinese: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拿走； 接受， 接纳
detailed_translations.english: to accept or choose something that is offered, suggested, or given to you

sentences.english: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere quickly and suddenly

sentences.english: We decided to have a picnic down by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定在湖边野餐。

sentences.english: a picnic table
sentences.chinese: 野餐桌

sentences.english: There is free parking for visitors, as well as a restaurant and picnic area (= a special area with tables where people can have a picnic ) .
sentences.chinese: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.english: The area is very popular with picnickers.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区很受野餐者的欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a picnic, you take food and eat it outdoors, especially in the country
to have a picnic

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

sentences.english: Why are you crying?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么哭？

sentences.english: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.english: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.chinese: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.chinese: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.chinese: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

sentences.english: We didn’t enjoy the day because the weather was so awful.
sentences.chinese: 那天我们很不尽兴，因为天气实在太糟。

sentences.english: ‘Why can’t I go?’ ‘Because you’re not old enough.’
sentences.chinese: “我为什么不能去？”“因为你年纪太小。”

sentences.english: Hubert never experienced any fear, and this was partly because he was not particularly intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 休伯特从来都没有害怕的感觉，部分原因是他这人不大聪明。

sentences.english: Many exam candidates lose marks simply because they do not read the questions properly.
sentences.chinese: 许多应试者失分只是因为没有好好地读题。

sentences.english: I decided to go with them, mainly because I had nothing better to do.
sentences.chinese: 我决定和他们一起去，主要是因为我没有更好的事情可做。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are giving the reason for something

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: a cloudy night with some light rain
sentences.chinese: 伴有些许小雨的多云的夜晚

sentences.english: Tomorrow, it will be cloudy and cool.
sentences.chinese: 明天多云，天气凉爽。

detailed_translations.english: a cloudy sky, day etc is dark because there are a lot of clouds

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

name: grandparent
trans: adv.祖父；祖母，外祖父；外祖母

sentences.english: My grandparents live in Sussex.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母住在萨塞克斯郡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祖父母；祖父或祖母；外祖父母；外祖父或外祖母
detailed_translations.english: one of the parents of your mother or father

sentences.english: a young child
sentences.chinese: 幼儿

sentences.english: He’s younger than me.
sentences.chinese: 他比我小。

sentences.english: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.chinese: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.english: young trees
sentences.chinese: 小树

sentences.english: When I was young, I wanted to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.english: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.chinese: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
young people

sentences.english: Her hair was short and dark.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.english: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.chinese: 光头的矮胖男人

sentences.english: The cat has left white hairs all over the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 白色的猫毛掉得满沙发都是。

detailed_translations.english: the mass of things like fine threads that grows on your head

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: a short meeting
sentences.chinese: 一个短会

sentences.english: Morris gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯笑了一声。

sentences.english: a short course on business English
sentences.chinese: 商业英语短期课程

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

sentences.english: Are your hands clean?
sentences.chinese: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.english: clean towels
sentences.chinese: 干净的毛巾

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.chinese: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.english: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.english: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.english: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.chinese: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.english: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.chinese: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

detailed_translations.english: without any dirt, marks etc

sentences.english: a stack of dirty dishes in the sink
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里的一堆脏碟子

sentences.english: How did you get so dirty?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会弄得这么脏？

sentences.english: kids telling dirty jokes
sentences.chinese: 讲着下流笑话的年轻人

sentences.english: a dirty magazine
sentences.chinese: 色情杂志

detailed_translations.english: covered in or marked by an unwanted substance

sentences.english: yesterday’s meeting
sentences.chinese: 昨天的会议

sentences.english: They arrived the day before yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他们前天到的。

detailed_translations.english: the day before today
on or during the day before today

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

sentences.english: Joe got up and left without a word of thanks .
sentences.chinese: 乔起身离开了，一句感谢的话也没有说。

sentences.english: ‘Pass the salt, please…thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “请把盐递过来…谢谢。”

detailed_translations.english: used to tell someone that you are grateful for something they have given you or done for you
the things you say or do to show that you are grateful to someone

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

detailed_translations.english: the large bright object in the sky that gives us light and heat, and around which the Earth moves
to sit or lie outside when the sun is shining

sentences.english: piano lessons
sentences.chinese: 钢琴课

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

detailed_translations.chinese: 得病（例如 had a cold 得了感冒）

sentences.english: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.english: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.chinese: 谁来的电话？

sentences.english: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.chinese: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone

sentences.english: Where did you learn to cook?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里学烹调的？

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a low heat for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把这调味汁用低火烧十分钟。

sentences.english: slices of cooked ham
sentences.chinese: 熟的火腿片

sentences.english: a cooked breakfast
sentences.chinese: 做好的早餐

detailed_translations.english: to prepare food for eating by using heat
to prepare food for eating by using heat

sentences.english: Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.english: Oliver’s not really her brother.
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.english: I never know what he’s really thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.english: She seems unfriendly at first, but she’s really very nice.
sentences.chinese: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真正地， 实际上； 很， 十分， 全然
detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think

sentences.english: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.chinese: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.english: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.chinese: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
detailed_translations.english: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap

sentences.english: a huge global computer network
sentences.chinese: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.english: the latest computer software
sentences.chinese: 最新的计算机软件

detailed_translations.english: an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，特雷西。

sentences.english: He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend

sentences.english: Are you in love with him?
sentences.chinese: 你爱上他了吗？

sentences.english: Why don’t you ask him yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不自己问他？

sentences.english: He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.chinese: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.english: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.chinese: 我一听声音就知道是他。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.chinese: 据说怀特夫人对她的丈夫管得很严。

sentences.english: Mr Brown and Mrs Smith have been carrying on for some months now.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生和史密斯太太发生暧昧关系已经好几个月了。

sentences.english: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.chinese: 他把椅子向我身边挪了挪，然后把约翰逊夫人的秘密告诉了我。

sentences.english: It was nice talking to you, Miss Ellis.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴与你交谈，埃利斯小姐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子
detailed_translations.english: You use Miss in front of the name of a girl or unmarried woman when you are speaking to her or referring to her

sentences.english: The only tools in the house are a hammer and a saw.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里仅有的工具是一把锤子和一把锯。

sentences.english: She was in the back yard sawing logs.
sentences.chinese: 她在后院锯木头。

detailed_translations.english: a tool that you use for cutting wood. It has a flat blade with an edge cut into many V shapes.
to cut something using a saw

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

sentences.english: I didn’t read the last chapter of the book.
sentences.chinese: 我没有看这本书的最后一章。

sentences.english: Add the flour last.
sentences.chinese: 最后加面粉。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing at the end, with no others after
after everything or everyone else

sentences.english: There’s plenty of fun for all the family.
sentences.chinese: 可以让全家人玩得很开心。

sentences.english: The children were having so much fun, I hated to call them inside.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子玩得很开心，我不忍心把他们叫进来。

detailed_translations.english: an experience or activity that is very enjoyable and exciting

sentences.english: We all went except him.
sentences.chinese: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

sentences.english: He slipped into his coat and went out.
sentences.chinese: 他敏捷地套上外衣，跑到外面去了。

sentences.english: We went in company.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起去的。

sentences.english: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.english: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.english: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.english: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.english: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.english: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.chinese: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.english: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.english: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.chinese: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
detailed_translations.english: in or to a particular place that is not where you are
used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do

sentences.english: The boy ate several dishfuls of ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 那小男孩吃了好几满盘冰淇淋。

sentences.english: They cut the cake in two and ate half each.
sentences.chinese: 他们把蛋糕分成两块，每人吃半块。

sentences.english: He nibbled away the apple peel, then ate the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 他先慢慢地咬去苹果皮，然后再吃果肉。

sentences.english: They drank one bottle of wine.
sentences.chinese: 他们喝了一瓶葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Between them they drank away every cent.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩把身上的钱都喝光了。

sentences.english: He drank so much that nothing he had would stay down.
sentences.chinese: 他喝的酒太多了，他会把吃的东西全都呕吐出来。

sentences.english: You should drink plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.english: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.chinese: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

detailed_translations.chinese: 等于enjoy oneself/have fun(doing sth)玩得痛快

sentences.english: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.chinese: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.english: a busy mother of four
sentences.chinese: 一个忙忙碌碌、育有四个孩子的妈妈

sentences.english: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.chinese: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.english: December is the busiest time of year for shops.
sentences.chinese: 十二月份是一年中商店最繁忙的时期。

detailed_translations.english: if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do

sentences.english: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.english: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.chinese: 谢泼德说的是实话。

detailed_translations.english: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

sentences.english: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.chinese: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.english: the delicious smell of new-mown grass
sentences.chinese: 新修剪的草坪的芳香

detailed_translations.english: very pleasant to taste or smell

sentences.english: A team of volunteers were putting up posters .
sentences.chinese: 一队志愿者正在张贴海报。

sentences.english: a poster campaign for the election
sentences.chinese: 选举的海报宣传

detailed_translations.english: a large printed notice, picture, or photograph, used to advertise something or as a decoration

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

sentences.english: Don’t forget to send us a postcard!
sentences.chinese: 别忘了给我们寄张明信片！

detailed_translations.english: a card that can be sent in the post without an envelope, especially one with a picture on it

sentences.english: My cousin Mark helped me to bring in the bags.
sentences.chinese: 我表弟马克帮我把包提了进来。

detailed_translations.english: the child of your uncle or aunt

sentences.english: Dear Sir or Madam, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的先生或女士，…

sentences.english: Dear Mrs. Wilson, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的威尔逊夫人，…

sentences.english: Dear Meg, ...
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的梅格，…

sentences.english: You're a lot like me, dear.
sentences.chinese: 你和我太像了，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: used before someone’s name or title to begin a letter
You can call someone dear as a sign of affection

sentences.english: Light travels faster than sound.
sentences.chinese: 光比声音传播得快。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅行； 行进； 被传送， 被传播； 走过， 驶过
detailed_translations.english: to move at a particular speed or in a particular direction
the activity of travelling

sentences.english: The window opened and a dog's head popped out.
sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.english: An idea suddenly popped into his head.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

sentences.english: the planet Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球

sentences.english: The earth shook.
sentences.chinese: 大地晃动了。

detailed_translations.english: the planet that we live on

sentences.english: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.english: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.chinese: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.english: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

sentences.english: She flushed and her eyes fell (= she looked down ) .
sentences.chinese: 她脸一红，垂下了眼帘。

detailed_translations.english: to move or drop down from a higher position to a lower position

name: fell
trans: adv.(fall的过去式）掉下，落下；摔倒

sentences.english: More than 100 trees were felled in just over an hour.
sentences.chinese: 短短一个多小时100多棵树就被砍倒了。

detailed_translations.english: to cut down a tree

sentences.english: Founded in 1935 in Ohio, Alcoholics Anonymous is now a world-wide organization.
sentences.chinese: 嗜酒者互诫协会1935年创立于俄亥俄州，现在是一个世界性的组织。

sentences.english: Eton College was founded by Henry VI in 1440.
sentences.chinese: 伊顿公学于1440年由亨利六世创办。

detailed_translations.english: to start something such as an organization, company, school, or city, often by providing the necessary money

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: She learned to ride when she was seven.
sentences.chinese: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.english: He was riding a large grey mare.
sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.english: He prefers travelling on the subway to riding in a limousine.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.english: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.chinese: 她用私家车载了朋友们一程。

detailed_translations.english: to sit on an animal, especially a horse, and make it move along
a trip on a horse or bicycle, or in a vehicle.

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.english: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的
detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want or need a drink

sentences.english: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.english: Does anyone want a drink of water?
sentences.chinese: 有谁想喝杯水吗？

sentences.english: a glass of sparkling mineral water
sentences.chinese: 一杯有气矿泉水

sentences.english: All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.chinese: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.english: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.chinese: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.english: a fresh water spring
sentences.chinese: 淡水泉

sentences.english: When dealing with a burst pipe, always turn off the water first.
sentences.chinese: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.english: contamination of the local water supply
sentences.chinese: 当地供水受到污染

sentences.english: Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.chinese: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.english: The garden needs watering daily.
sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

sentences.english: She bought an English dictionary for me.
sentences.chinese: 她给我买了一本英语词典。

sentences.english: I bought the car from the store for cash.
sentences.chinese: 我用现金从这家商店买下这辆汽车。

sentences.english: We stood in with him who bought us the meals.
sentences.chinese: 他为我们买回了吃的，大家分摊了那笔钱。

sentences.english: Oh, what a big watermelon!
sentences.chinese: 喔唷， 这么大的西瓜!

sentences.english: A watermelon is red inside and green outside.
sentences.chinese: 西瓜内红外绿。

sentences.english: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
sentences.chinese: 这种西瓜个头儿大。

detailed_translations.english: a large round fruit with hard green skin, red flesh, and black seeds

sentences.english: She has a bump on the back of her head.
sentences.chinese: 她的后脑勺上肿起了一块。

sentences.english: He had a few injuries, mostly bumps and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他有几处受了伤，大都是肿块和瘀青。

detailed_translations.english: an area of skin that is raised because you have hit it on something
to hit or knock against something

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

detailed_translations.chinese: 得病（例如 had a cold 得了感冒）

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

sentences.english: They have a stomach ache, or diarrhea, or their grilled cheese sandwiches "tasted funny" or "didn't look right.
sentences.chinese: 他们胃痛，或腹泻，或者说他们的烤芝士三明治味道很奇怪或看上起不对劲。

detailed_translations.english: If you have a stomach ache, you have a pain in your stomach

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

sentences.english: Andy has a fever and won’t be coming into work today.
sentences.chinese: 安迪发烧了，今天不来上班。

sentences.english: I woke up this morning with a fever and an upset stomach.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上醒来时我发烧了，胃也不舒服。

sentences.english: She’s running a fever (= has a fever ) .
sentences.chinese: 她在发烧。

detailed_translations.english: an illness or a medical condition in which you have a very high temperature

detailed_translations.chinese: 使发烧；使狂热；使患热病
